turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: How do you think we got here??!!

turns.speaker: BOX
turns.text: You walked in. I saw you. Don't you remember?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Where do you think we came from?

turns.speaker: BOX
turns.text: From? From? From?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: We were sent here and you know it. Others have been sent here. Where are they? Hiding?

turns.speaker: BOX
turns.text: Hiding? Yes! Hiding, hiding.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Where do we go?!  Where do we go from here??!!

turns.speaker: BOX
turns.text: Is that the wind?  Not yet...  You must hear my birds sing.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: You know about Sanctuary! I know you do! You have to help us! You don't have a choice! It isn't your decision!! Tell us.

turns.speaker: BOX
turns.text: Never a pair. I have never had a pair.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Where do you send them?

turns.speaker: BOX
turns.text: You're a beautiful pair.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Answer the question!

turns.speaker: BOX
turns.text: Do you know how long all this will last? Not thirty years... or thirty thousand years... but thirty thousand years... and you'll be part of it. Ages will roll... Ages. And you'll be here... the two of you... eternally frozen... frozen... beautiful.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: There must be somebody else up here. I can't believe that he's --

turns.speaker: BOX
turns.text: Let me sculpt you and I will show you where the others have gone.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: That's better.  How do you want us?

turns.speaker: BOX
turns.text: Nude. Imagine, a pair.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: It'll be all right...

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: How do you want us?

turns.speaker: BOX
turns.text: Up there.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: All right. Now you keep your bargain.

turns.speaker: BOX
turns.text: Wait for the wind! Wait and hear the birds sing over you!

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: We're ready.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: How did they get in here?

turns.speaker: BOX
turns.text: Regular storage procedure... the same as the other food... The other food stopped coming and they started.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: What other food?

turns.speaker: BOX
turns.text: Fish and plankton, sea greens and protein from the sea.  It's all here -- ready -- fresh as harvest day. Fish and plankton, sea greens and protein from the sea... And then it stopped coming and they...  ...came instead. So I store them here. I'm ready. And you're ready. It's my Job -- protein, plankton, grass from the sea.

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: It's a real privilege, Sandman.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Thanks.  I thought you'd be older. I expected a Red.

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: I am.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Your own work?

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: And I did it myself right on there.

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: I designed it myself.  What'll it be... a face job or a full-body job?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Just the face.

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: Fine... Holly will get you ready. You're in good hands, believe me.

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: Do you have anything special in mind?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I don't care... Just get it over with.

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: Hurry... hurry... hurry.

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: You are here. I couldn't believe it when they told me. What are you doing?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Turn this way.  No, no... not you... YOU!

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: You should've seen me take my last Runner... perfect.  I backed him up against a residence pool and when he terminated... his hand...  So now you've seen him... what's the difference awake or asleep?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Open your eyes once, idiot.  It's not every day that a Sandman son is born. I'm telling you, Francis -- that's him!

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: Maybe, maybe not. What's the difference? Come on, Logan, let's get out of here before everybody finds out.

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: Had enough?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Even the alarm didn't wake him.

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: You need a lift. Let's go to Arcade and celebrate...  your alert successor... Logan-6.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Has anyone ever broken in to where the babies are?

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: Not in my time...

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: Why?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Just wondered... what happens?

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: Dunno... flameout maybe. Whatever happens, you can bet it's final. But who would want to find out?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: But you don't know, you just say what everyone says. "One for one. One for one."

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: Well, why not!? That's exactly how everything works. How else could the city stay in balance -- You have a better idea?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: No, but at least I wonder sometimes -- instead of doing that "one for one" song of yours. You sound like a sleepteacher with a stuck tape.

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: Well the minute you get a better idea you can stop wondering.  You know, Logan -- you wonder a lot. Too much for a Sandman.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Did you ever see Francis-8?

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: I never even visited Nursery before tonight.  When you wonder, it slows you up -- you know?

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: I don't know what makes you so curious. You have any idea who his seed-mother was?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Of course not! I'm curious, not sick.

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: You missed something special.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Well... you can't have them all.

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: The damned Yellows are getting out of hand. Those three ought to be in Cathedral. No business scrambling in Arcade...

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: What an old, old man you're getting to be, Francis. Weren't you ever a Yellow? I bet you were even wilder than --  come on, Sandman.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: You should have been with us in Nursery, Daniel. I'm positive I recognized him --

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: Come on. I don't want to miss the filing-in. There'll be some I know tonight, I think...

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Now there's a few who could have been his seed-mother.

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: Only a few? You're just not trying.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Who invited you?

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: I'm in my party mood.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: That was a great shot you made.

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: Yes.  But you look a little rusty to me -- what were you doing, wondering?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I just might look in on New You 483 myself.

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: You? Why? You're already beautiful.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: No -- it's that last Runner -- someone in 483 was trying to help him.

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: What the hell took you so long?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Did you ever see anybody renew?

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: I think you've been skulling out too much. First Nursery and now stupid questions.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Did you?

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: Of course.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Anybody we know?

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: Look... why don't you get into the water... you need it... more than I do.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I'm fine...  See you...

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: At Carousel tonight?

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: What's going on, Logan?!

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: It has nothing to do with you.

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: What are you talking about?! I saw you let a Runner go?  I saw you, Logan?? Tell me!!

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: Why did you do that??!!

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I didn't do anything, Francis! They've made us believe that...

turns.speaker: FRANCIS
turns.text: Why did you do that???!!!

turns.speaker: HOLLY
turns.text: It's him! The first Sandman. He killed... Doc.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: No, Holly -- wait! He's running. Tell them the rest!

turns.speaker: HOLLY
turns.text: He's the one. You too. I remember. He was in a hurry. Just a face job. Dark hair, I said. Then he killed Doc and you grabbed me -- and the machine blew up and I ran... I ran.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Holly. Holly! Please... The other Sandman. Remember the one who came after --

turns.speaker: HOLLY
turns.text: That's right. The other one came after. The older one. Smashing, killing, burning!

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: ...and he was hunting the first one, this one. Wasn't he? Wasn't he? This one was running, the other one was hunting him...

turns.speaker: HOLLY
turns.text: Yes. Oh yes.  He was after you. I remember. You're running!

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: What's your name?

turns.speaker: MARY
turns.text: I'm Mary 2.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Where do you live, Mary?

turns.speaker: MARY
turns.text: Here.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Why aren't you in Nursery?

turns.speaker: MARY
turns.text: I'm very smart.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: When do you go up?

turns.speaker: MARY
turns.text: I never go upstairs. You're a nice old lady.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: What's wrong, Available?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Please... No.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Please... no?  You mean "not here" -- that's it? You're a private Available but particular.  Don't worry. There's no one here but me. And you.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: No.  Just no.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: You prefer women?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Well then...?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Nothing. I felt sad, I put myself on the circuit. It was a mistake.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Sad? What made you sad?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: A friend of mine went on Carousel tonight. Now he's gone.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Yes... probably he was renewed?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: He was killed.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Killed? Why do you use that word?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Isn't it right? Isn't that what you do? Kill.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I never 'killed' anybody in my life. Sandmen terminate Runners.  Who brought you?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Nobody. I felt sad... I put myself on the circuit.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: You felt sad. What's your name?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Jessica.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: You're beautiful. Let's have sex.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Later.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: But you put yourself on the circuit!

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I thought I had to do something.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: And?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I changed my mind.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: And now?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Curious.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: About what?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: How a Sandman lives.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Let's have sex.  I thought you were curious.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Not about that.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I'm listening.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I'm afraid to tell you.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I'm not armed.  Well?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Why is it wrong to run?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: You shouldn't even think such things...  And you picked a strange person to say them to --

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I suppose. But what if you want to live?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: So? Do what everyone does. Try like hell for renewal.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: But if you're one of the misfits... that's where I come in.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I didn't say that I would run... I just...

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Are you a 5 or a 6?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Six. I go red next year.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: You're years away... I don't know why you're thinking of these things, much less talking about them.  Want to try?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: What Quad do you live in?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: K.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: You're sure you don't want to try?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: You could have called me yourself.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: But I wasn't sure you'd come.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Here I am.  Shall I come in?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I couldn't get you out of my mind.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I'm the most beautiful woman you've ever seen, I suppose?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Maybe... sure...

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Thanks... but I have the choice.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Of course.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Then it's still no.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: You can have any woman in the city. What do you really want?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: You know.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I don't believe you. There has to be more.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Why show me?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I'm going to run.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Why tell me?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: You know something.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: About running, dying what?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Both... running's what I'm interested in.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I know what everyone knows. Try like hell for Renewal. You have the same chance everyone else has.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: It's different now. Help me.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: How can I?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Where did you get that?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: A Runner gave it to me.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: And then you killed him, right?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I let him go... believe me.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I don't..

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Speak to your friends for me, Jessica... please...

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Please? What friends?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I don't have much time.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I never heard of a Sandman running... ever...

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: And I never heard of Sanctuary.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Are you here to help me?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: What do you need?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: What're you going to do?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: That's tomorrow.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I wish I could help you.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Maybe you'll think of something...

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I wish I knew what you think I know.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: If you did know, you'd tell me.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Of course --

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: If you trusted me, you'd know.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: We're coming to Arcade.  Shall we Relive together?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: A Runner... Cathedral. A woman.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: You're not going, are you?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Why not? Maybe she'll help me. You won't. You'd better stay here.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I'd rather be with you.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: That's nice.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: They're like beasts. Wild.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Maybe they're angry because they're grown in meccano-breeders.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Instead of what? Nine months inside a woman:  We're all raised the same but most of us don't become cubs in Cathedral.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Some people say children need human mothering.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Insane. Nurseries are better than any mother could be.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I'm only telling you what I've heard...  Haven't you ever wondered what your seed-mother was Like...?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Uh-uh.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I have.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: When did you begin to question Lastday?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I don't remember exactly... except I was a Green.  What would you like to relive, Logan?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Let's see -- how long has it been?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Just follow -- no matter how it seems...

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: But what is this -- why?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: The Cubs. When they're flying on muscle there's no way to catch up. Without the dazzle, they'd just go past us --  -- too fast

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Muscle? I don't know that one.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I'm ashamed. I was bringing you to be killed.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Where? Sanctuary? Can you take me there?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Logan, I don't know where Sanctuary is. But if I take you to them, they'll kill you.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: All right. But why? I didn't kill the Runner.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Yes, but they won't know that... or care. They're hunting you, Logan. Maybe me too, now...

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: That's nothing... there's a Sandman behind us, too and there'll be more soon. Take me to them.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I -- I can't.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Then -- why don't you leave me -- go to them -- explain

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: No. Not that either.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Are you taking me to them?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Yes.  I don't know what else to do -- with him following us.  Why do you keep running from your --

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Because he's my friend --  and I don't want to be killed by him -- or anyone.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: He's good, isn't he?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Will he find us and kill us? Yes... or one of the others.  You know there's only one place to go now...

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: They won't believe us.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I'd rather take my chances with them... than with Francis.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: They won't listen.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: You think Sandmen will?  There's no other way for me,

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: We'll convince them.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Exactly four steps now. Let me lead you.  Now to the right. It's narrow here, you'll have to get behind me.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: How will they know we're coming?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: They're watching us now. They'll let us in when they're sure.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Will you take me with you?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Why, Jessica? You're still a green.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: How do we know this is the right way?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: It's the only way.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: What do you suppose this was...?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Some kind of breeding pens... I suppose... They say people used to breed animals, fish, anything...  ...to eat, of course.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Ycch.  To kill things and then eat them. It must have been a savage world.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I'm afraid.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: It's brighter there... besides, we can't go back.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I don't know what's going to happen to us Logan but --  Are you glad you didn't kill him?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: It doesn't make any difference anymore.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: You're really one of us now, aren't you?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: You knew that I wasn't before, didn't you?  Why did you stay with me?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I wanted to...  ...And you... what made you kill Sandmen?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I had to. I did kill... for the first time in my life I killed.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Because you felt like a Runner, didn't you.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I guess so... I know I felt something I never felt before... and I didn't like it... not a bit.  I'll tell you one thing... Sanctuary better be worth it. That's the last place for me to live now.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: For us.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: What's that?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: It feels like breath. It makes everything move. Your hair is moving.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: And yours.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I hate outside! I hate it!

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: We'll be all right...  We will...

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Don't!

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Sooner or later, we'll have to try something.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: It's getting dark and cold. I'm tired.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Why don't we rest here? We know we can eat these.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Do you think everything's going to turn to ice?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I doubt it.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Don't ever let go.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I won't.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: It all seemed to make sense until Box.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Do you think he was telling the Truth?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Maybe we're the first ones to get through...  Maybe Sanctuary is near, now... another protected place. It couldn't be outside.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: How would anyone know? Even if we find it -- we can never go back.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: You're right... it must be near now. We'll find it.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Thirty thousand years didn't last very long, did they?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: What does it mean?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: The Lifeclocks have no power outside.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: You can have any woman in the city. What do you really want?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: You know, Jessica.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: ...But I still have the choice...?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Of course.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Then the answer's yes...

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I have never seen a face like that before. It must be the look of great age. Whoever he was he was terribly old.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Yes, do you think that's why he looks so sad?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: They all have names and numbers on them. I wonder what they are?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: "Beloved Husband". "Beloved Wife". What can all that mean?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Look at his face... and his hair...  Is that what it is to grow old?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: It could be...

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: That sweet madman -- how could he come to exist?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: He had a mother and father -- and he knew them.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: One in a million, I suppose

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: There's a Sanctuary... there is!

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: You want there to be one... that doesn't...

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: There has to be! I know it exists! It has to!!

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: No, there doesn't. Not really -- just so many want it to exist... so many who don't want to die... want it so much that a place called Sanctuary becomes "real". But it doesn't exist. It never existed. Just the hope.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: You're wrong!! It has to be!! It Just has to be!!

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: What are we promising him? What can we possibly give him?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: He asked if we would bury him when his time comes.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: We can't. We're going back.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: To what?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I'm going to try and tell people what we've seen and --

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: You're lying! You'll never have the chance to tell anybody anything! You'll be killed the moment you're seen!

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Do you expect me to let things go on without trying to change them?!

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Things won't change... you know that! We can live here together, Logan... have a life as long as his... together!

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Things change!

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: You want to go back to kill, is that it?! Now, you'll want to kill your own!!! Kill Sandmen!!! Killing's all you ever...!!!

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Jessica... listen to me... listen to me...  The Lifeclocks made me kill Francis. They make people die or be killed every day. If I didn't try and destroy that... I couldn't live here or anywhere. Do you understand?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I want to be alive and with you, that's all I want.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: "Beloved son"...  So people stayed together for that feeling of love... They would live and raise children together and be remembered.  I think I feel that way, Logan. Can we be that way?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Yes. You and I, Jessica.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: And Sanctuary?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Sanctuary is the right to live... nothing more. But nothing less, either...

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Beloved husband...

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Beloved wife...

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: What does that water do?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: It's part of the hydrogalvanic system. The ocean tides are changed into energy somehow.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Is it inside the city?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Of course.  I don't know where...  I just took them for granted.  It's our only chance.

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: Yes, cats, of course. What else could they be? Cats. Of course each one has his own name too.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: But there are so many of them. Do you know each one separately.

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: Yes indeed, everyone. Actually, they all have three.  "The naming of cats is a difficult matter. It isn't just one of your holiday games. You may think at first I'm mad as a hatter when I tell you a cat must have THREE DIFFERENT NAMES."  An ordinary name and a fancy name. That's two. Do you want to guess what the third one is?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: And... and how were you grown? Inside your mother?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: Yes...

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Are you sure?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: Mother and Father said so... you know?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: What kind of jewel is this?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I don't know.

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: You're both full of secrets like Macavity.  Did you steal this?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: "Macavity, Macavity, there's no one like Macavity, There never was a cat of such deceitfulness and suavity."

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: What belongs to the people?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: All this. All of it.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: What people?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: I don't know... but it does.

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: We'll have to bury him.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: What's that?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: They're put into the ground so they can be visited by the living...

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: I'll make the arrangements.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: At least it's over...

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: Of course... that's settled then. But just you remember your promise...

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: We'll remember. But that's a long time off...

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Come with us.

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: Where are you going?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Goodbye.

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: Oh, my...

turns.speaker: RECEPTIONIST
turns.text: Hello, Sandman.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: RECEPTIONIST
turns.text: Do you want to see Doc?

turns.speaker: RECEPTIONIST
turns.text: We don't get many Sandmen. I think we've only had one other since I've been here.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: A Sandman can get as sick of his face as anyone else. Where's the doctor?

turns.speaker: RECEPTIONIST
turns.text: I like your face. Would you mind if Doc took a picture? I'd like him to give your face to somebody else.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: It's all right with me. Is he here?

turns.speaker: RECEPTIONIST
turns.text: My name's Holly... Holly 13. In ancient times they said my number was unlucky. Do you believe in luck?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: No -- Look, I'm in a hurry.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: How long have you been living here?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: For as long as I can remember.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: What kind of place is this?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: Just a place, I suppose... who knows?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: How did you get here?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: I have always been here...

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Are there any other humans?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: Gracious... no.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Have any other people ever passed through?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: But there may be a few around somewhere.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: What makes you think so?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: My parents thought so. Mother and Father. You know?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Mother and -- ? You knew your mother and father?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Where are they?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: Dead... they're dead... and buried.

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: They're beautiful. May I have one too please?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: No -- I'm sorry. It's not possible.

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: It isn't fair. I'll give you one of my favorite cats... a Jellicle cat.  "Jellicle cats have cheerful faces, Jellicle cats have bright black eyes; They like to practice their airs and graces And wait for the Jellicle Moon to rise."

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I'm sorry but I don't have anything to give you.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: What's beyond this place -- do you know?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: No, no, no

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Did your Mother or Father ever mention another place?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: Never, never, ever. Nothing.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: May we stay here for a while? We'd like to rest.

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: Of course you can stay. This belongs to the people.

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: Are you ready to put him in?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: Not yet.

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: We're leaving.

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: What a pity. I was hoping you'd be here to bury me.

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: To a city with thousands and thousands of people.

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: Alive?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: Thousands and thousands... as many as my cats?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: More... many more.

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: And all alive you say?

turns.speaker: OLD MAN
turns.text: Is that really it? It doesn't seem very far. Will we be there soon?

turns.speaker: LOGAN
turns.text: I promise. We'll go on as soon as it's light.
